title: Block athletic font
author: Jim Nicholson

comments.content: "RECENT" is **[United Serif Ext (Light)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112214/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=House-Industries%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=United%20Serif%20Ext%20-%20Light&fid=278cb3e952153fc8cdea0302ef62d3ef&fsize=60&text=RECENT&wrap=2)** while "CONCEPTS" is **[United Serif Semi Ext (Black)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112214/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=House-Industries%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=United%20Serif%20SemiExt%20-%20Black&fid=c811fc720ea40acd6b9e7bc341c77d38&fsize=60&text=CONCEPTS&wrap=2)** both by House Industries
